TopicTitle: AARGH, stupid people messing with my stuff!

Articles.Content:
So I walked into Engineering class today expecting to record our autonomous car's run on the track we laid out on Tuesday. Lo and behold, someone had broken off all the male PWM cable pins on the car.

Seriously, who the hell would do that?!

So. Frustrating. That video is due by TODAY.

*Rapid stripping and soldering commences*
